description: We were billed for 40 hours of custom report development but only received 25 hours of work.

communications.author: John Miller
communications.message: Filing dispute - we only received 25 hours of the 40 hours billed for custom report development.

communications.author: Sarah Chen
communications.message: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. I'm reviewing the time logs now.

description: Consulting services for store layout optimization did not meet the agreed-upon scope and deliverables.

communications.author: Lisa Park
communications.message: The consulting engagement did not cover the 30 stores as agreed. Only 18 stores were visited.

communications.author: Mike Johnson
communications.message: I'm pulling up the SOW to verify the scope. Will update you within 48 hours.

communications.author: Mike Johnson
communications.message: Confirmed that only 18 stores were completed. Escalating to the consulting team for resolution.

description: Billed for 60 hours of regulatory review consulting but the agreed scope was 40 hours maximum.

communications.author: David Wright
communications.message: Our contract clearly states a cap of 40 hours for this engagement. Please adjust.

communications.author: Sarah Chen
communications.message: Reviewing the contract terms now. The additional 20 hours may have been pre-approved via email.

communications.author: System
communications.message: Case escalated to dispute review committee.

description: MES Integration was incomplete and caused production line disruptions for 3 days.

communications.author: Tom Richards
communications.message: The MES integration failed during go-live and caused 3 days of production downtime.

communications.author: Mike Johnson
communications.message: We apologize for the disruption. Our engineering team is investigating.

communications.author: Mike Johnson
communications.message: Engineering confirmed the root cause. Escalating for executive review and compensation discussion.

description: Bandwidth overage charge appears to be a duplicate of a charge already on a previous invoice.
resolution: Confirmed duplicate charge. Credit memo CM-001 issued for $10,825.00 (including tax).

communications.author: John Miller
communications.message: The bandwidth overage charge of $10,000 appears on both INV-2025-0048 and INV-2026-0004.

communications.author: Sarah Chen
communications.message: I can confirm this is a duplicate charge. Processing credit memo now.

communications.author: System
communications.message: Credit memo CM-001 issued for $10,825.00.

description: Compliance monitoring suite was unavailable for 12 hours during a critical reporting period.
resolution: Service credit of $8,500.00 applied as goodwill compensation.

communications.author: David Wright
communications.message: The compliance suite was down for 12 hours on Feb 13 during our quarterly SEC filing window.

communications.author: Mike Johnson
communications.message: We sincerely apologize. Processing a service credit immediately.

communications.author: System
communications.message: Credit memo CM-006 issued for $8,500.00.

description: Patient portal setup was quoted at $8,000, not $10,000 as billed.
resolution: Original quote verified at $10,000 per signed SOW dated 2026-01-15. Dispute rejected.

communications.author: Dr. Karen Lee
communications.message: Our internal records show a quote of $8,000 for the patient portal setup.

communications.author: Sarah Chen
communications.message: The signed SOW from Jan 15 shows $10,000 for patient portal setup. Attaching the document.

communications.author: Dr. Karen Lee
communications.message: I see the signed SOW. We'll process the payment.

description: POS integration for 50 stores was not authorized. Only 30 stores were in the approved scope.

communications.author: Lisa Park
communications.message: Our approval was for 30 stores only. The additional 20 stores were never authorized.

communications.author: Mike Johnson
communications.message: Reviewing the change order documentation. Will respond within 24 hours.

description: Supply chain optimization deliverables did not meet the agreed quality standards.

communications.author: Tom Richards
communications.message: The optimization recommendations were generic and not tailored to our operations as promised.

communications.author: Sarah Chen
communications.message: I understand your concerns. Scheduling a review meeting with the delivery team.

description: Promotional discount of $5,000 was not applied as agreed during contract renewal.
resolution: Confirmed promotional discount was missing. Credit memo CM-008 issued for $5,412.50.

communications.author: Maria Santos
communications.message: Our renewal agreement included a $5,000 promotional discount that isn't reflected on INV-2026-0024.

communications.author: Mike Johnson
communications.message: Confirmed - the discount was approved but missed during invoicing. Issuing credit memo.

communications.author: System
communications.message: Credit memo CM-008 issued for $5,412.50 (including tax adjustment).
